column4: can anyone please give me a hand, my hard drive has seemingly dissapeared from my laptop and theres a bunch of stuff I could really ddo with not losing
it has been working perfectly up till tonight when it booted into initramfs
I'll assume you've booted with the LiveCD and checked that the disk was still there and visible?
I dont have a live cd handy, ive been trying to search from the shell, the drive by-uuid is trying to boot seems there
I'll assume you've tried like "fdisk -l /dev/sda" and you actually see the drive and the partitions, yah?
